extendedInfo.description: Redondo Beach, Located 8 miles south of LAX, is a laid back, beautiful beach city with a rich history, unbeatable sunsets, a world famous pier and plenty of fantastic ocean front hotels and restaurants at every price level. Go kayaking, scuba diving, surfing, biking, fishing, whale-watching or shopping. Take a gondola ride or visit the SEA Lab. Discover why there is always More to Sea in Redondo Beach! Download this FREE Visit Redondo Beach app to discover hundreds of attractions, dining, events, accommodations, water activities, shopping and more! Use the âNearby Meâ feature to see listings of things to do, current events, dining, shopping, etc. that are closest to your location. Share your experiences and photos to Facebook, Twitter, Flickr and YouTube. Browse the live Twitter feeds from @VisitRedondo to learn whatâs hot, whatâs new, and whatâs cool! Everything you need to know about Redondo Beach, CA is all here in one app.This app is brought to you by the Redondo Beach Chamber of Commerce & Visitors Bureau.

reviews.title: Redondo Beach rules!
reviews.comment: Love the town, happy to have an app for it. Thanks for building it. Hope to see some more functions for us locals.
reviews.author: A Google User
